name: ClusterSecurityGroupIngress
description: Specifies inbound (ingress) rules for an Amazon Redshift security group.

properties.name: ClusterSecurityGroupName
properties.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift security group that will be associated with the ingress rule.

properties.name: CIDRIP
properties.description: The IP address range that has inbound access to the Amazon Redshift security group.

properties.name: EC2SecurityGroupName
properties.description: The Amazon EC2 security group that will be added the Amazon Redshift security group.

properties.name: EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId
properties.description: The 12-digit AWS account number of the owner of the Amazon EC2 security group that is specified by the EC2SecurityGroupName parameter.
